content: SPX-L core bit (mm) Ultimate core bit for coring in all types of concrete – for <2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (35 mm diameter and above) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Unique Hilti X-Change module system (52-202 mm diameter) enables easy core removal, fast stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Save significant space and weight by replacing traditional core bits with a single barrel and multiple modules (X-Change module) Designed for the most challenging conditions, the core bit excels in concrete with a high rebar content Applications Rig-based wet coring in all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Core bit diameters are nominal, for actual diameter please contact Hilti Customer Service For use with: DD 120, DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160 Base materials: Concrete Technical Data | For use with | DD 120, DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160 | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | X-Change module | Yes (52-202 mm) | Laser welded segments | Yes | Segment height | 10 mm ### ITEMS- 2159012 - Core bit BI 12 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159381 - Core bit BI 16 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159382 - Core bit BI 18 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159387 - Core bit BI 20 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159389 - Core bit BI 22 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159390 - Core bit BI 24 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159397 - Core bit BI 28 mm x 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159401 - Core bit BI 30 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159406 - Core bit BI 32 mm X 12 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc - 2159578 - Core bit B 47/430 SPX-L - Package Size 1 pc
